required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Suitability of PICC for Transpulmonary Thermodilution Compared to CICC
clinical_study.official_title: Are Peripherally Inserted Central Catheters (PICC) Suitable for Cardiac Output Assessment With Trans-pulmonary Thermodilution

lead_sponsor.agency: Fondazione Policlinico Universitario Agostino Gemelli IRCCS

clinical_study.source: Fondazione Policlinico Universitario Agostino Gemelli IRCCS

brief_summary.textblock: Peripherally inserted central catheters (PICCs) are increasingly used in intensive care unit (ICU) as an alternative to centrally inserted central catheters (CICCs) for intravenous infusion. In the present study we try to assess their reliability for measuring cardiac index (CI) with trans-pulmonary thermodilution (TPTD) technique.

primary_outcome.description: comparison of hemodynamic measurements made by the TPTD from the VolumeView/EV1000TM system via PICC vs. CICC.

secondary_outcome.description: Comparison of single-lumen 4 Fr PICCs to CICC in their reliability of assessing cardiac output
Comparison of dual-lumen 5 Fr PICCs to CICC in their reliability of assessing cardiac output

intervention.description: Thermodilution was attempted via PICC and via CICC

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- adult patients (≥18 years) admitted to the ICU
- Patients requiring hemodynamic monitoring using EV1000TM
- Patients having both PICC and CICC in place (these patients had their PICC replaced with a CICC, usually at the time of ICU admission, or vice versa, usually at the end of their ICU stay, and were enrolled immediately after the placement of the new device before the previous one was removed)
Exclusion Criteria:
- body weight <40 kg
- severe aortic regurgitation or intra-cardiac shunt
- treatment with an intra-aortic balloon pump
- contraindication for placement of PICC, CICC or a femoral arterial catheter
- abdominal aneurism
- extracorporeal circulation
- pregnancy
- lack of informed consent

overall_official.affiliation: Università Cattolica del sacro Cuore- Fondazione Policlinico Universitario A. Gemelli IRCSS

facility.name: Fondazione Policlinico Universitario A. Gemelli IRCCS

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Fondazione Policlinico Universitario Agostino Gemelli IRCCS
